page.title: 17Community Care in Bodenham
page.content:
The Weir House is an old people's home. It is owned and managed by Mrs C A Griffiths. She has 2 Nurses who help with the care and welfare of 6 residents. The house, which stands near the banks of the River Lugg, dates back to the 17th century. A total of 11 people live in the house.
Hill House is a privately owned home for mentally handicapped adults. Mr and Mrs A Hopkinson, the owners, care for 12 residents who are aged from 19 upwards.The house has a large hall, sitting room, dining room, kitchen and office and there is a private room for residents to entertain their families. An education and leisure room is open 5 days a week. 2 share a room. A mini bus is available to take the residents out.They go to Herefords Gateway Club.
